subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The American Tom Danielson won the 17th stage of the Vuelta yesterday, and Alexander Vinokourov grabbed the overall race lead. Danielson, a 28-year-old rider for Discovery Channel, finished the 103.6-mile stage from Adra, Spain, to Granada in 4 hours 9 minutes 55 seconds.
